summary: In skyrim, Desmound is a nord's/troll's/Khajiit's etc.'s best friend.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][size=6][color=#c00000][center]DESMOUND, the MAMMOTH COMPANION[/center][/color][/size][/font][font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=3]In Skyrim, Desmound is a nord's/troll's/khajiit's etc.'s Best Friend![/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=3]
[/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=3]He is a nice little fellow, who will fight for you and take your orders, just like any other companion.[/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium]
[/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2]- He levels with you, until[/size] [color=#c00000][size=4]lvl 80![/size][/color][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2]- Can keep up with you[/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2]- Cute![/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2]
[/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2][color=#c00000]*He is located in Riverwood*[/color][/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2]
[/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2]If you have any problems or ideas, write them down in the comment section.[/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2]
[/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2]If you enjoy the mod, please do endorse and follow me.[/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2]
[/size][/font]
[font=Franklin Gothic Medium][size=2]Thank you! [/size][/font][img]http://www.ecardmax.com/hoteditor/smileys/Happy/13.gif[/img]
author: Ziggy
